org.echo.mobile.framework.facade

Interface SidechainFacade

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EchoFramework
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EchoFrameworkImpl, SidechainFacadeImpl

    public SidechainFacade

    Encapsulates logic, associated with sidechain functionality

      • generateEthereumAddress

        void generateEthereumAddress(java.lang.String accountNameOrId,
                             java.lang.String password,
                             Callback<java.lang.Boolean> broadcastCallback,
                             Callback<org.echo.mobile.framework.model.TransactionResult> resultCallback)

        Generates ethereum address for required account accountNameOrId

        Parameters:
        broadcastCallback - Callback for result of operation broadcast
        resultCallback - Callback for retrieving result of operation (not required). Retrieves result of transactions if exists - history id which contains call contract result, if not exists - empty string
